Article Prototype

If you want to create awesome D3 Satellite maps, you're going to need to fiddle with the parameters to get the zoom and angles right. If you want to read up more on the rather esoteric names of each of these (below) check out the D3 geo projections documentation.

distance: scale:
Rotation of the globe: yaw (λ): pitch (φ): roll (γ):
Center (x): Center (y):
tilt: precision:
Clip to Horizon: YesNo
If no, select a ClipAngle between 0 and 180:
Longitude Graticule intreval: Latitude Graticule intreval:

Click to redraw the map.
